name: Witch/Warlock
description: While many believe you dabble in dark arts, you are a practitioner of natural, although somewhat primitive, magic.

exploits.name: Backstab
exploits.description: You leap onto the back of a target (you must be behind the target to do this); on a successful hit, you plunge your dagger repeatedly into the target’s back, doing double damage. If the attack misses, you instead fall to the ground and land prone.

exploits.name: Evil Eye
exploits.description: You make a MAG mental attack at a target within sight. On a success, that target is unable to access its LUC pool for one hour.

exploits.name: Maniacal Cackle
exploits.description: You let loose a deranged cackle that disturbs all who hear it. You make a MAG mental attack against those within 30’; on a hit, targets are made afraid.

exploits.name: Raven’s Flight
exploits.description: Once per day you may transform into a raven, with a Fly speed of 10. You immediately moves that speed. You can only use this ability once per day.

exploits.name: Sacrificial Dagger
exploits.description: When using a knife or dagger, you automatically inflict the Pained condition.

exploits.name: Torturous Curses
exploits.description: You make a MAG mental attack against a creature within 30’, and on a success the target becomes cursed; they can shake off the curse as though it were a regular condition. Each time you take this exploit, choose one of the following curses: Amateur’s Amnesia, Brainless Babbling, Craven Coward, Heartless Hurts, Layabout’s Lethargy, Madman’s Mirth, Practitioners’ Prey.
